plugins.name: Atomic by BigBasket
plugins.description:
Built this to enhance design and development efficiency in BigBasket.


Atomic transforms a single hex code into a complete set of design tokens and themes, instantly applying your brand's unique identity across all your apps and websites. This powerful plugin streamlines multi-brand design systems and campaigns, allowing you to effortlessly generate themes, export developer-ready tokens, and maintain consistency across every product.


Features:


Theme Generator

Define your core brand colors and let Atomic intelligently adjust shades to create a complete palette. You can then export this palette directly to your Figma canvas or instantly generate Figma variables as a complete theme. This helps you create brand modes instantly with proper semantics, enabling faster iterations for brand campaigns and seamless experimentation with colors, fonts, and effects.


Export to JSON

Export all your Figma design tokens directly to JSON, providing developers with a consistent and up-to-date source of truth. This significantly speeds up hand-offs and reduces implementation discrepancies.


Effects

Precise shadow colors and configure them for smoother, more nuanced visual effects. Apply consistent effects across all your brands, updating global styles with ease.


Spacing & Radius

Establish a consistent visual rhythm and hierarchy using dedicated tokens for spacing and border radius. You can use default values or easily adjust them to perfectly align with your brand guidelines.


Neutrals and Semantics

Automatically generates essential primitives and neutral colors. These foundational elements are crucial for building a robust and flexible design system that scales across multiple brands.



Any feedback?

Connect at hello@uxmurali.com

accepted.name: Murali
accepted.description: Product Designer who strives to create meaningful experiences that make people's lives better.

plugins.tagline: Your Brand, Your Styles, Instantly. Just One Click.

plugins.name: Gradientify
plugins.description:
Bring vibrant, layered gradients into your Figma designs. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Generate random gradients with an optional noise effect
  2. Paste CSS code from gradientify.app to apply gradients to layers
  3. Use gradients as fill properties for easy customization


Free trial

Try it out up to 5 times in each mode (random generation and CSS import), or unlock unlimited use with a license key.


Thank you for your support

This plugin was built to complement gradientify.app, a free tool for designing and animating gradients for the web. Buying a license helps keep the project going ❤️


Contact me:

If you have questions or comments, please send me a message to rengifo.eder@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate and paste CSS gradients to layers as fill properties

plugins.name: Syncalise
plugins.description:
Because life is too short to manually copy translations, Syncalise beams the words from Lokalise straight into your Figma designs. ✨


Syncalise is a Figma plugin that:

  1. Talks to Lokalise via their API 🤝
  2. Lists all your translation keys & languages 🗝️
  3. Lets you slap any translation onto a selected text layer in a single click 🖱️
  4. Helps you annotate & export strings without the usual tears 💧


All that, wrapped in a tiny React app living comfortably inside Figma.


90-second quick start ⏱️

  1. Grab the plugin from Figma Community or clone this repo and build locally (see dev setup below).
  2. Open the plugin inside Figma → you'll land on Settings.
  3. Paste your Lokalise API token and hit Save. (We never send it anywhere except Lokalise – pinky promise.)
  4. Pick a project from the dropdown.
  5. Head over to the Keys tab, select your language, search a key and click it while a Figma text layer is selected.
  6. 💥 Boom – translated! Time to grab a coffee ☕.
plugins.tagline: The "Why-am-I-still-copy-pasting-strings?" Figma plugin

137558.description:

  6. 💥 Boom – translated! Time to grab a coffee ☕.

networkAccess.reasoning: Syncalise needs to access the Lokalise API to fetch projects and translations.

plugins.name: Text Flow
plugins.description:
「Text Flow」は、指定したレイヤー名のテキストに用意したテキストを流し込むプラグインです。これで、テキストのコピペ地獄とはサヨナラ！Figmaでのデザイン作業をスピードアップすることができます。


  1. レイヤー名の設定：テキストを入力したいレイヤーに、共通の名前をつけます。
  2. テキストの準備：流し込みたいテキストを、改行で区切って準備します。
  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。
  4. 入力と適用：レイヤー名とテキストを入力して、「適用」ボタンをクリックします。
plugins.tagline: テキスト流し込みを効率化

  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。

plugins.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
plugins.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

137207.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
137207.description:

137207.release_notes: Added nested instance previews and sync button.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: Design to System
plugins.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system — effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. 🔍 Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. 📌 Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. 🎯 Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements — ensuring consistency and systemization.
plugins.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system – automatically.

136167.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system – automatically.

plugins.name: Color Explorer
plugins.description:
🎨 What is Color Explorer?

Color Explorer is a smart Figma plugin designed to help designers, early-stage founders, agencies, strategists, DTC operators, and marketers quickly find the perfect color palettes for their brand.


With over 3,000+ curated palettes (increasing everyday), you can preview and apply full-brand color systems to any selected frame or layer—in one click.


🚀 Key Features

  1. Alpha-Safe Mapping: Automatically preserves transparency values (alpha channel)
  2. 3000+ Color Palettes: Handpicked and categorized palettes to match different brand moods and industries
  3. One-Click Apply: Instantly replace all fill/stroke/text colors in your selection
  4. Lightweight and Fast: Designed for speed and real-time creative flow


🔧 Use Cases

  1. Explore visual directions before committing to a brand look
  2. Save time in early-stage design sprints
  3. Quickly swap palettes in Figma without manual editing
  4. Present polished options to clients and stakeholders


💸 One-Time Purchase

Get lifetime access for a one-time fee of $10. No subscription. Free updates forever.
plugins.tagline: One Click to Try 3000+ Color Palettes on Your Design.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of design and development services.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Fast Page Selector
plugins.description:
Efficient page selection and navigation when working with files containing many pages.


Features

  1. Page Grouping: Automatically group pages using Divider pages (pages starting with `---` or containing `divider`)
  2. Select by select box: Display each group in select boxes for intuitive page selection
  3. Compact View: Hide/Show functionality to minimize plugin window and efficiently utilize workspace
plugins.tagline: Navigate hundreds of pages in a flash.

134511.description:

plugins.name: Wireframe Pilot
plugins.description:
Description

Wireframe Pilot is a Figma plugin that lets you create beautiful, professional low-fi landing page wireframes for a wide range of industries—instantly. Choose from free, hardcoded industry templates or use AI to generate custom content and color schemes tailored to your business. Perfect for designers, agencies, and business owners who want to jumpstart their web projects with best-practice layouts and content.


Key Features

* One-click wireframe generation for 12+ industries (landscaping, tech, law, etc.)

* AI-powered content and color palette generation (with the option to use your own OpenAI API key)

* Customizable sections, layouts, and color schemes

* No coding required—everything happens inside Figma


Instructions

1. Open the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Select your industry and customize sections, layouts, and colors as desired.

3. (Optional) Enter your OpenAI API key to unlock AI-powered content and color generation.

4. Click “Generate Wireframe” to add a complete landing page wireframe to your canvas.

5. Edit and iterate as needed!
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate modern, wireframes for landing pages within in Figma.

138266.description:

Choose from free, hardcoded industry templates or use AI to generate custom content and color schemes tailored to your business. 3. (Optional) Enter your OpenAI API key to unlock AI-powered content and color generation.

4. Click “Generate Wireframe” to add a complete landing page wireframe to your canvas.

5. Edit and iterate as needed!

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs access to OpenAI's API for generating color schemes and content, Google Fonts for loading the Inter font family, and the custom backend for AI proxy.

138266.release_notes:
What's changed in this new version?

Interface Updates:
- Implemented a streamlined toggle switch for Basic/Pro mode selection
- Enhanced UI layout with improved visual hierarchy
- Optimized dialog interface for better Figma integration
- Refined input controls and button states

Technical Improvements:
- Enhanced accessibility compliance
- Optimized plugin initialization
- Refined error handling and user feedback

System Enhancements:
- Enhanced API key management system
- Improved visual feedback for system status
- Updated user interface components for better consistency
138266.tagline: Instantly generate modern, wireframes for landing pages within in Figma.

plugins.name: Padding Scaler
plugins.description:
Padding Scaler helps designers rapidly create compact, default, and spacious layout variants by scaling the vertical paddings of auto-layout frames.


Instead of editing each value manually, simply select your frames, choose a scale (0.5× to 4×), and instantly apply consistent spacing changes.


Ideal for testing different density modes or aligning with design system spacing tokens.


✨ Features:


Works with one or many auto-layout frames


Choose vertical, horizontal, or both directions


Fast, intuitive UI with live scaling preview


Save time, stay consistent, and iterate layout decisions faster.
plugins.tagline: Instantly scale vertical and/or horizontal paddings in auto-layout frames to test density modes.

134488.name: Padding Scaler

plugins.name: Figma Link Exporter
plugins.description:
igmaファイル内のセクション（Section）、コンポーネント（Component）、コンポーネントセット（ComponentSet）、バリアント（Variant）を自動検出し、それぞれの直接リンクを生成するプラグインです。デザインシステムの管理や共有に最適です。

主な機能

  1. 自動検出: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、コンポーネントセット、バリアントを自動で検出
  2. 詳細情報表示: 各要素の番号、種類、名前、直接リンクを一覧表示
  3. 複数形式でエクスポート: 検出した情報をTXT、CSV、JSON形式でダウンロード可能

使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムのドキュメント作成
  2. チーム内でのコンポーネント共有
  3. 開発者へのデザイン仕様の引き渡し
  4. プロジェクト管理のための要素整理

使い方

  1. プラグインを起動
  2. 「情報を取得」ボタンをクリック
  3. 検出された要素の一覧を確認
  4. 希望の形式（TXT/CSV/JSON）を選択してダウンロード
  5. シンプルな操作で、デザインファイル内の重要な要素へのリンクを素早くエクスポートできます。
plugins.tagline: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、バリアントを自動検出し、それらの直接リンクをTXT/CSV/JSON形式でエクスポートできるプラグインです。

plugins.name: QR Generator
plugins.description:
Generate crisp, scannable QR codes directly in Figma—for free. Whether you’re linking to a website, product, or prototype, it’s never been easier to add functional codes to your designs.


Need more than just the basics? Unlock the ability to fully customize your QR codes:

– Adjust colors to match your brand

– Tweak corner and eye styles

– Control padding, sizing, and error correction

– Apply your own design language


Perfect for teams and designers who want their work to look as good as it works.

Use it for client presentations, posters, packaging, or anything else where detail matters.


Free to generate. Paid to make it yours.


You can contact us at support@easestud.io

visit easestud.io

plugins.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
plugins.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

1. In-plugin TOC generation

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
plugins.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

128139.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
128139.description:

  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
128139.release_notes: Optimized speed of extracting frames for TOC
128139.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

plugins.name: Heavy Page Organizer
plugins.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
plugins.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

127297.name: Heavy Page Organizer
127297.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
127297.release_notes:
New Features:
➕ Multi-column layout support: You can now organize multiple main components into their own columns.
📎 Sub-component alignment: Sub-components that begin with .[Main Component Name] are automatically grouped and aligned beneath their respective main components.
📄 Section column: Sections are now placed in their own vertical column to the far right.

UX Improvements:
🎯 Autofocus on first input for faster, smoother use.
⌨️ Return key support – press Enter to trigger the “Apply” action without needing to click.
127297.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

plugins.name: Round Off
plugins.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
plugins.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

130230.name: Round Off
130230.description:

Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
130230.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

plugins.name: Holy Shade
plugins.description:
Holy Shade - A Color Matching Challenge! 🎨


Test your color perception skills with Holy Shade, a fun and engaging game designed for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts! 🖌️

A target color is displayed at the top.


Choose the matching shade from the options below.


The closer your choice, the higher your score!


💡 Why Play?


Improve your color differentiation skills.


Sharpen your ability to recognize subtle shade variations.


Challenge yourself and compete for the highest score!


Are you ready to master the art of color perception? 🌈✨

plugins.name: Interflow Connect
plugins.description:
Transform your design-to-management workflow with Interflow Connect, the Figma plugin that brings your UI flows directly into the Interflow. Designed for product teams and designers who demand efficiency, Interflow Connect eliminates the tedious process of manual uploads, allowing you to focus on what truly matters—creating exceptional user interfaces.


Streamlined Workflow, Unmatched Efficiency


With Interflow Connect, transferring your designs from Figma to Interflow is as simple as a few clicks. Select your desired frames within Figma, assign or create the appropriate flow and section names, and upload your screens directly to the Interflow without ever leaving your design environment. This seamless integration ensures your UI flows are always up-to-date and easily accessible for audits and reviews, making collaboration across teams more efficient than ever.


Secure, Direct Integration


Security and simplicity are at the heart of Interflow Connect. By inputting and authenticating your personal API key—generated from your Interflow settings—the plugin securely identifies your account, organization, and product. This robust authentication process guarantees that your design data is transmitted safely and accurately, offering a streamlined connection between your creative process in Figma and your product management workflow in Interflow.


Empower Your Product Design and Management


Interflow Connect is more than just a plugin—it’s the bridge between your design interface and your management platform. Whether you’re refining your product’s UI, conducting detailed audits, or ensuring that every screen aligns with your design strategy, this plugin is engineered to supercharge your workflow. Enjoy a smoother onboarding process, reduce manual errors, and keep your design projects perfectly synchronized with your product roadmap.


Experience a new level of productivity and collaboration by integrating your design and management tools. With Interflow Connect, you’re not just uploading screens—you’re empowering your team to build better products, faster.
plugins.tagline: The bridge between your interfaces in figma and your interflow.

plugins.name: CSV to Table in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


• Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Transform Data Files into Editable Tables in Figma

94775.name: CSV to Table in Figma
94775.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


• Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!
94775.tagline: Transform Data Files into Editable Tables in Figma

plugins.name: Update Genres Usage
plugins.description:
The page must have at least one of the following section hierarchies with the following names and elements within them:


- info (section)
    - genre (section)
        - genre name (shape with text)   <----|
    - game (section)                      (connection)
        - game name (shape with text)    <----|



Genre name must be connected to shapes containing game names and only to them.




For example we have such structure:




"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________




After the update, it will look like this


"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |     (2/2)                   (1/2)     |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________
plugins.tagline: Update Genres Usage

plugins.name: Dimensões - by Ultra Solutions
plugins.description:
Sabe aquela dor de começar um projeto do zero, configurando manualmente cada tamanho de arte e cada grid?


Nosso plugin elimina esse retrabalho: em um clique você gera quadros prontos para social media, landing pages, projetos behance, área de membros, etc — todos posicionados lado a lado e com layouts precisos. Chega de formatos perdidos, dimensionamento errado e ter que ficar perguntando em grupo ou buscando em trabalhos passados.


Com o “Dimensões – by Ultra Solutions”, seu tempo será gasto apenas criando o design, e não ajustando tamanho por tamanho.


Acompanhe nosso site oficial e nossas redes, fique por dentro de mais novidades!

Clique aqui para acessar nosso site oficial!
plugins.tagline: Chega de perguntar qual tamanho da imagem da área de membros de tal plataforma, etc.
